Sentencas: Sustainable aviation attracts the attention of academic and industrial research with the aim of lowering the environmental impact and reducing greenhouse gas emissions.
Titulo: Investigation of two hybrid aircraft propulsion and powering systems using alternative fuels

Sentencas: This paper presents two proposed high bypass three-shaft turbofan engines combined a molten carbonate fuel cell (MCFCturbofan) and a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC-Turbofan).
Titulo: Investigation of two hybrid aircraft propulsion and powering systems using alternative fuels

Sentencas: Energy and exergy analyses are conducted to investigate the performance of the aircraft at the cruising operation mode.
Titulo: Investigation of two hybrid aircraft propulsion and powering systems using alternative fuels

Sentencas: The used fuels are kerosene and an alternative fuel blend of 75% methane and 25% hydrogen.
Titulo: Investigation of two hybrid aircraft propulsion and powering systems using alternative fuels

Sentencas: The results show that the base turbofan has a maximum thrust force of 153 kN, while the SOFC-and MCFC-turbofans have 116 kN and 107 kN, respectively.
Titulo: Investigation of two hybrid aircraft propulsion and powering systems using alternative fuels

Sentencas: The thermal and exergy efficiencies are 43.4% and 52% for the base-turbofan, 52.8% and 66.2% for the SOFC-turbofan, and 71% and 87.6% for the MCFC-turbofan.
Titulo: Investigation of two hybrid aircraft propulsion and powering systems using alternative fuels

Sentencas: The carbon emissions are reduced from 18 kg/s to about 3.7 kg/s using the alternative fuel blends.
Titulo: Investigation of two hybrid aircraft propulsion and powering systems using alternative fuels

Sentencas: The turbofan engine weight increases by 18% using the SOFC and 40% using the MCFC, while the thrust-to-weight ratio is reduced from 2.7 for the base-turbofan, to 1.5 for the SOFC-turbofan, and 1.06 for the MCFCturbofan.
Titulo: Investigation of two hybrid aircraft propulsion and powering systems using alternative fuels

Sentencas: Adding a fuel cell increases the engine weight but also improves the system performance and reduces the emissions.
Titulo: Investigation of two hybrid aircraft propulsion and powering systems using alternative fuels
